content:
Hi there.
Trying 2.0.5 but get the following error:

database_1 | 2019-10-21 10:15:38.618 UTC [42] ERROR: column zerver_userprofile.enable_stream_sounds does not exist at character 1116

Any ideia how to fix?

Guess the problem is that I was running an old master...
Is it possible to rebase my installation to official releases?
@Ricardo Duarte I would recommend just upgrading to current master; it's pretty stable as we're hoping to release soon.
